snippet: Liu Han, 49, his brother Liu Wei, and three associates were executed on Monday, the state news media reported.
abstract: Chinese billionaire brothers Liu Han and Liu Wei are executed after organized crime, murder and extortion conviction; is noteworthy that sentences are carried out despite Liu family’s $6 billion wealth; China leads world in executions.

byline.contributor: Kiki Zhao contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Liu Han, 49, his brother Liu Wei, and three associates were executed on Monday, the state news media reported.

headline.main: China Executes Billionaire Who Ran ‘Mafia-Style’ Criminal Gang
headline.print_headline: China: Billionaire and His Brother Are Put to Death
